verses.verse: The <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> I <S%G3870>exhort<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> am also an <S%G4850>elder<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3144>witness<s%> of the <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, and <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G2844>partaker<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> that <S%G3195>shall<s%> be <S%G601>revealed<s%>:

<S%G4165>Feed<s%> the <S%G4168>flock<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which is <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, taking the <S%G1983>oversight<s%> <S%G3361>there<s%>, not by <S%G317>constraint<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1596>willingly<s%>; <S%G3366>not<s%> for filthy <S%G147>money<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> of a ready <S%G4290>mind<s%>;
And <S%G2532>when<s%> the chief <S%G750>Shepherd<s%> shall <S%G5319>appear<s%>, you shall <S%G2865>receive<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> that fades not <S%G262>away<s%>.

<S%G3668>Likewise<s%>, you <S%G3501>younger<s%>, <S%G5293>submit<s%> <S%G240>yourselves<s%> to the <S%G4245>elder<s%>. <S%G1161>Yes<s%>, <S%G3956>all<s%> of you be subject one to <S%G5293>another<s%>, and be clothed <S%G1463>with<s%> <S%G5012>humility<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G498>resists<s%> the <S%G5244>proud<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1325>gives<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> to the <S%G5011>humble<s%>.

Humble <S%G5013>yourselves<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G2900>mighty<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G5312>exalt<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> due <S%G2540>time<s%>:

Be <S%G3525>sober<s%>, be <S%G1127>vigilant<s%>; <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G476>adversary<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5612>roaring<s%> <S%G3023>lion<s%>, walks <S%G4043>about<s%>, <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G5101>whom<s%> he may <S%G2666>devour<s%>:

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> <S%G436>resist<s%> <S%G4731>steadfast<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith<s%>, knowing <S%G1492>that<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3804>afflictions<s%> are <S%G2005>accomplished<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G81>brothers<s%> that are <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> has <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, after that you have <S%G3958>suffered<s%> a <S%G3641>while<s%>, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2675>make<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G2675>perfect<s%>, <S%G4741>establish<s%>, <S%G4599>strengthen<s%>, settle <S%G2311>you<s%>.

<S%G1223>By<s%> <S%G4610>Silvanus<s%>, a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> I <S%G3049>suppose<s%>, I have <S%G1125%G99999>written<s%> <S%G3641>briefly<s%>, <S%G3870>exhorting<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1957>testifying<s%> that <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1511>is<s%> the <S%G227>true<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519%G99999>where<s%> you <S%G2476>stand<s%>.

The church that is <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%>, elected together <S%G4899>with<s%> <S%G782>you<s%>, greets <S%G5209>you<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> so does <S%G3138>Marcus<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%>.

Greet <S%G782>you<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G5370>kiss<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%>. <S%G1515>Peace<s%> be with <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.
